Reviews.Title: “Averege Hotel”
Reviews.Author: ThomasOommen
Reviews.Content: Average 3 star hotel, quiet far from main centre,not so impressive. Service is poor,staff is not warmly and non-accommodating for even simple requests. Typical tourist hotel with no-service. Continental Breakfast is pathetic. Will not suggest an Indian to stay there.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value as for Rome”
Reviews.Author: b0b082
Reviews.Content: I've booked here for a night while passing from Rome and I couldn't find anything else for less than some hundreds euro. The negative side is that it's in unlucky position for tourist stuffs...just by the GRA and few over Anagnina metro station (from there I took couple of minutes by taxy). I've been located in an external room, it was a bit in a "corner", windows were right on the garden, so I preferred not to open anything...and there was no wifi (at least I didn't found it), but it was very large, well fornitured (king bed, desk for writing, lcd tv) and very clean, with AC and good bathroom. For one night and in "emergency" conditions it was more than I expected! I couldn't try the breakfast because I was leaving too early, so they prepared me a take away breakfast...nice from them, althuogh a warm coffee would be nicer (especially because I was leaving 15 min before buffet was opening)...

Reviews.Title: “Good value of money with reasonable service”
Reviews.Author: r_noi
Reviews.Content: Located out of Rome with the cheaper price, shuttle bus service to Anagnina subway station then you can go to central Rome from there, take only 25 min. limited seats for shuttle bus so it’s wise to book ahead. If you want to see Rome at night, it will be some problem as shuttle bus finish by 19.15 hrs. you can ask front office to arrange taxi or shuttle at night (not sure). Front staff is helpful and good English speaking. Room is okay with balcony, toilet is not new but acceptable. Breakfast is limited but just enough to fill you full. Nothing to see around at hotel, it’s in industrial area. So if you just want a place to sleep with reasonable price, this is the one. Not recommend to go to Rome from “Capannelle” train station because no shuttle bus and nothing to see for scenery along the railway.

Reviews.Title: “Difficult location”
Reviews.Author: toma348
Reviews.Content: Nice and large room, good service. Free internet in room, works ok, coffe making in room possible. Bad location, difficult to find, between 2 motorways in industrial area. Limited shuttle service to metro-walking not possible. Stayed in the annex - very close to motorway, traffic noise very loud. Only recommended for short stay near Ciampino airport.

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Giardino d'Europa
HotelInfo.Address: Lucrezia Romana 95, 00178 Rome, Italy
